title: How to Make Onion Chutney in Andhra Style

steps.headline: Add chopped onions in an electronic chopper.
Remove them from the chopper and place them in a utensil.
Add the seasoning to the chutney ( prepared with red chilies, mustard seeds, cumin seeds and white lentils).
Serve it at meals or with the idlis or dosas.

text: Add chopped onions in an electronic chopper.  Add chopped green chilies.  Add salt.  Add tamarind pulp.  Add sugar.  Chop them coarsely.  Remove them from the chopper and place them in a utensil.  Add turmeric powder.  Add asafoetida powder.  Mix well.  Add the seasoning to the chutney ( prepared with red chilies, mustard seeds, cumin seeds and white lentils).  Mix well.  Serve it at meals or with the idlis or dosas.
